title: Marketing Flash Deals Daily Report
description: Daily report for marketing flash deals

Date_Period.description: The time period during which the report is generated (format: DD-MM-YYYY HH:mm - DD-MM-YYYY HH:mm)

Sales.description: Total sales with amount and currency

Orders.description: Total number of orders for flash deals

Buyers.description: Total number of unique buyers for flash deals

Click_Through_Rate_CTR.description: Percentage of users who clicked on a flash deal compared to the total number of users who viewed it

Product_Impression.description: Total number of times flash deal products were displayed

Product_Clicks.description: Total number of clicks on flash deal products

Sales_Per_Buyer.description: Sales per buyer with amount and currency
